      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077038">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077038">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077038">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077038">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077038" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077039">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077039">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077039">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077039">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;from within any database, or visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Trexler Library website
           </a>
           and search in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass
           </a>
           on the journal title to determine if it is available full text through our library.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077039" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077040">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077040">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077040">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What websites are out there on Lehigh Valley music?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077040">
          <div id="boxatt17077040" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129057">
              <a id="link_20129057" href="http://www.bach.org" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129057,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129057}); ">
               Bach Choir of Bethlehem
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129069">
              <a id="link_20129069" href="http://www.cmsob.org" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129069,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129069}); ">
               Chamber Music Society of Bethlehem
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129075">
              <a id="link_20129075" href="http://www.allentownsymphony.org" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129075,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129075}); ">
               Allentown Symphony
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129092">
              <a id="link_20129092" href="http://www.musikfest.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129092,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129092}); ">
               Musikfest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129109">
              <a id="link_20129109" href="http://www.celticfest.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129109,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129109}); ">
               Celtic Classic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077041">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077041">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077041">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly books on my subject?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077041">
          <p>
           Here are some books that contain relevant material:
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Allentown 1762-1987
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.827 A433se)
           <br />
           19th, 20th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Allentown: A Pictorial History
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.827 B655a)
           <br />
           19th, 20th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Proceedings of the Lehigh County Historical Society
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.827 L522p)
           <br />
           20th century. See especially index in 2004 issue, but also general index.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Pennsylvania Dutch
           </em>
           , by Klees (level C, call #974.81 K63p)
           <br />
           18th century.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Pennsylvania Dutch
           </em>
           , by Parsons (level C, call #974.81 P272p)
           <br />
           18th century.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Lehigh Valley: An Illustrated History
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.82 H177l)
           <br />
           20th century.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            A History of Bethlehem Pennsylvania
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.822 L661h)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Arts of the Pennsylvania Germans
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.81 P4161 v. 17)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Bethlehem of Pennsylvania
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.822 B5621)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Bethlehem of Pennsylvania: The Golden Years
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.822 B5622)
           <br />
           19th, 20th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            America's Musical Life: A History
           </em>
           (level B, call #780.973 C899a)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Historical Notes on Music in Bethlehem, PA.
           </em>
           (level B, call #780.9748 G847h)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Music and Musicians of Pennsylvania
           </em>
           (level B, call #780.9748 R739m)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Musical Life in the Pennsylvania Settlements of the Unitas Fratrum
           </em>
           (level B, call #780.9748 D249m)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            The Bethlehem Bach Choir
           </em>
           (level B, call #780.9 W235b)
           <br />
           19th, 20th centuries.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Church Music and Musical Life in Pennsylvania in the XVIII Century
           </em>
           (level B, call #783 N277c)
           <br />
           18th century.
          </p>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;">
           <em>
            Northampton Heritage
           </em>
           (level C, call #974.822 A361n)
           <br />
           18th, 19th centuries.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077041" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077042">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077042">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077042">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find newspaper articles about music in the Lehigh Valley?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077042">
          <div id="boxatt17077042" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129150">
              <a id="link_20129150" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://digital.lib.lehigh.edu/brownandwhite/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129150,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20129150}); ">
               Lehigh University Brown &amp; White
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of the Lehigh University newspaper from 1890s to 2000.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20129175">
              <a id="link_20129175" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129175,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12619431}); ">
               Morning Call
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Includes full text of all articles published 1982 to present. Especially strong in 20th century, but also includes articles on early Lehigh history.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077043">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077043">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077043">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate peer-reviewed journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077043">
          <div id="boxatt17077043" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20129205">
              <a id="link_20129205" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20129205,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Scholarly articles on many aspects of gender and music.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20128960">
              <a id="link_20128960" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://0-web.b.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/basic?sid=2ca51327-514c-4ade-b3d0-1a63609295dc@sessionmgr110&amp;vid=1&amp;tid=2003EB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20128960,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'American Music', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20128960}); ">
               American History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               World history database. Good for U.S. history and culture back to 1492.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077044">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077044">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077044">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Can I search all the library databases and catalog together, in one search?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077044">
          <p>
           Most of the databases and the library catalog can be searched together in a new library search engine called
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//">
            Search Central
           </a>
           found on the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//">
            Trexler Library website.
           </a>
           Most useful when working with narrow topics where you need everything that's available.&nbsp; Several search features are missing from the original databases, like relevance, and language and peer review limiters.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077044" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642191" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17077045">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077045">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077045">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I cite sources in a bibliography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077045">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077045" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17077046">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17077046">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17077046">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17077046">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17077046" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
